sentences.sContent: The system is not 100 per cent foolproof.
sentences.sCn: 该系统不是百分之百不出毛病的。

synos.tran: 十分简单的；十分安全的；不会错的

trans.tranCn: 十分简单的；十分安全的；不会错的
trans.tranOther: Something such as a plan or a machine that is foolproof is so well designed, easy to understand, or easy to use that it cannot go wrong or be used wrongly
